label: Self-Deception (Demo)
description:
I had planned for this album to imitate existing sounds rather than consist entirely of original works. This track was a result of this planning, with major inspiration from The Binding of Isaac. However, I didn't feel as though I could bring this track to completion as I'd imagined, and ended up scrapping it.

Recorded during the Momentum Deceived era. Produced on Bitwig Studio.
